Module com.pwr.dpp.backlog.dpp
Package com.pwr.dpp.backlog.dpp.business

Class JsonDatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
com.pwr.dpp.backlog.dpp.business.JsonDatabaseHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseHandler
public class JsonDatabaseHandler extends Object implements DatabaseHandler
Allows reading and writing JSON datafiles.

  • Constructor Details

    • JsonDatabaseHandler

      public JsonDatabaseHandler(String databaseDirectoryPath, String tasksFilename, String commentsFilename, String usersFilename)
      Initializes JsonDatabaseHandler
      Parameters:
      databaseDirectoryPath - database directory path.
      tasksFilename - name of the file to store tasks. If it doesn't contain ".json" extension, it will be added automatically.
      commentsFilename - name of the file to store tasks. If it doesn't contain ".json" extension, it will be added automatically.
      usersFilename - name of the file to store tasks. If it doesn't contain ".json" extension, it will be added automatically.
